title: Our Services | ColumbiaDoctors - New York
description: The Department of Rehabilitation and Regenerative Medicine has built a series of programs and centers designed to offer expertise in specific areas.
cleaned_text: Our Services Make an Appointment Our team is here to help you make an appointment with the specialists that you need. The Department of Rehabilitation and Regenerative Medicine has built a series of programs and centers designed to offer expertise in specific areas. Our specialists draw on the newest therapies to return each patient to their highest possible level of function.
